StarkNet is a permissionless Layer 2 network for deploying scalable Ethereum dApps.

by Pull Request Team| May 14, 2025

StarkNet is a general-purpose Layer 2 network for anyone to deploy dApps. StarkEx is a tailored L2 scaling engine for specific applications like dYdX or Immutable X.

Read More...
StarkEx is a customized zk-rollup solution built for specific high-performance apps.

by Pull Request Team| May 14, 2025

Cairo is StarkNet's native language built for zero-knowledge proofs. Solidity is Ethereum's smart contract language, not optimized for zk-rollups.

Read More...
Cairo is a low-level language designed for writing StarkNet smart contracts.

by Pull Request Team| May 14, 2025

StarkNet batches thousands of Ethereum transactions off-chain using STARK proofs. It reduces gas costs and increases scalability while preserving Ethereum's security.
